synopsis:
In this life, I was born with a gold spoon in my mouth. I thought my future would be bright but I didn't realize that the place I reincarnated into was a discontinued R-19 tragic BL novel that my friend wrote. And of all things, I became the older twin sister of Lisandro, the crazy obsessive yandere male lead who horribly, brutally murdered the sickly prisoner Frey at the end of the novel. Had I not remembered this, I would have just skipped into the sunset, blissfully unaware...

"Noona!"

With a suitcase in one hand, I flinched and looked behind me. The mysteriously beautiful Frey came towards me with a bright smile on his lips. In no time, he towered over me with his tall, lean body.

"Where are you going?"
"Um."
"Where?"

'Don't ask.' I wanted to say that firmly, but I just wore a smile instead. Frey, who kept staring me, tried to grab my suitcase. Taken aback, I held onto it tightly. In return, I heard a refreshing, clear laugh.

"Let me hold it for you."
"No, I'm fine."
"Why? Oh, I get it. You're trying to escape. Am I getting in your way?"

The hand holding the suitcase flinched. As he looked at me with an eerie smile, he looked exceedingly dangerous the more he stared. There was ice glistening behind his golden irises.

"You thought I wouldn't know," his large hand wrapped around mine and held the suitcase handle tightly, "Just to avoid me and that bastard, you're trying to run away." His harsh words didn't match his aloof expression. "It'll spell trouble, Yuni. If you disappear from my sight." The gentle and feeble, sickly prisoner suddenly had became an obsessive yandere himself.

(Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

alternative_titles.ja: キス・アンド・ライド

title: Reiton kyōju to samayoeru shiro

alternative_titles.en: Professor Layton and the Wandering Castle
alternative_titles.ja: レイトン教授とさまよえる城

synopsis: The people of London have witnessed an enormous castle floating in the sky. As many people have been disappearing, Gressenheller University's Professor Hershel Layton is called to investigate the Wandering Castle, and find the people who have vanished.

title: Stalker Danshi

synonyms: Itsumo Ushiro ni Boku no Kage
Koko ni Inai Kimi ga Suki

synopsis:
Yaoi anthology dealing with stalkers.

Note: Story 2 was collected in Takkun to Stalker Danshi: Kyou wa Takkun no Tissue wo Tabemashita, story 3 was collected in Toshishita Kareshi ni Hirowaremashita., and story 6 was collected in Iya yo Iya yo mo?

title: Hitotsu Yane no Shita no Kedamono

alternative_titles.en: Under One Roof With the Beast
alternative_titles.ja: ひとつ屋根の下のケダモノ

synopsis:
Daigo's going to be a university student starting from spring. He has two male cousins who are identical twins, called Shin and Jin. Daigo has always been secretly in love with the kind Jin who's always treated him like a younger brother. However, his feelings were exposed by Shin, who's always doted on him as well. Under pressure by Shin who said to him "Choose me," although he resisted at first, looking at the same face as the person he likes and hearing the same voice, his heart can't help but beat faster...?!

(Source: Canis Major Scanlations)

title: Ryle to Louis
synopsis:
A rootless mercenary meets the Crown Prince of a certain country. This meeting just might be a ray of light in the darkness for the supernatural war that will soon begin to tear the land apart.

(Source: MangaHere)

alternative_titles.ja: スーパー・カルテジアン・シアター

title: Double Section
synopsis:
Nakai, an auditor from an insurance company, is already used to being glared at by the people from his line of work, so when his neighbor happily smiled at him, he's surprised and glad. But that did not last for too long when it turned out that his neighbor Takahashi is the assigned salesperson he need to deal with because there's a problem regarding to the client, and moreover, Takahashi hates auditors like Nakai. What will happen to this neighbors whose jobs are like water and oil?

(Source: MU)

title: Akizuki-san wa Otona ni Narenai

alternative_titles.ja: 秋月さんは大人になれない

synopsis:
The story centers on Yusa, a 25-year-old nursery school teacher. Yusa's boyfriend is Akizuki, a 32-year-old president of a toy company. Akizuki is handsome and capable, but he unfortunately still behaves in childish ways. When they begin living together, their everyday lives become more and more strange.

(Source: ANN)

title: Manaka no Mori
synopsis:
Manaka is a high school girl who is burying herself in part-time jobs. One day at an old mountain shrine, she meets the physical form of a god of fire named Chikaomi. As they continue meeting each other at that shrine, Manaka gradually finds her previously monochrome daily life becoming filled with color. Set in the city of Sendai, Japan, warm bonds spun together by meetings and departures.

A romantic story about an awkward girl and a god who's lost his powers.

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha, translated)

title: Dokoka Tooku no Hanashi wo Shiyou

alternative_titles.ja: どこか遠くの話をしよう

synopsis:
There's a town atop a mountain in South America: a green place where the blue sky goes on and on. Chiro, a girl with strange abilities, lives there. This is the story of her experiences with the vast, deep and heartwarming world around her.

(Source: MU)

title: 6-gou Keibi
synopsis:
Shuuichi Suou is your typical otaku NEET. But what happens when his latest figurine order turns out to be something completely out of this world?

(Source: MU)

title: Wa no Kage
synopsis:
Set in a world that has a ring encircling the planet, there is a nation that follow the tradition of chasing the shadow cast by this ring. They go as far as the ends of both northern and southern edges of the continents to accomplish their "shadow chasing." For what reason? Who knows. What is known about this nation is that they have been able to preserve their small nation in so small part to their advanced understanding of the "Corona Solids," which have been utilized to build an array of creations, most notably the "hakukai armour," which enables its user to enhance their natural ability, as well as create weapons out of this special creation. However, it seems that a storm is brewing upon this nation...

(Source: MU)

title: Kimi wa Boku no Mono
synopsis:
Tsugumi is sixteen years old and in love with Shougo Mizushima! He's so handsome and popular, though, that she doesn't think she has a chance. But not even the news that her mother has arranged a marriage for Tsugumi is enough to stop her from hoping. Having a fiancé she's never met just means Tsugumi needs to act fast. She confesses to Mizushima that same day. But that same day, someone else confesses to Tsugumi? Who is this lusty little eleven-year-old, and how does he know Tsugumi's name...!? 

Note: Contains two side-story chapters.

(Source: MU)

title: Kanojo wa Mizumizushii

synonyms: My Girlfriend is Dripping with Passion

synopsis:
On a cold winter afternoon, Daichi Inui notices his classmate Mizuki Mizuno crying and shaking at her desk. After he offers her a tissue, she profusely apologizes, saying that she gets excessively sweaty and teary-eyed when she is nervous. Noticing that his dry hands have become moisturized by her tears, Daichi begins to wonder if hanging out with Mizuki would enrich both his body and soul.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Chinyuuki: Tarou to Yukai na Nakama-tachi

synonyms: Chinyuki: Taro and his Amusing Companions
alternative_titles.ja: 珍遊記 ～太郎とゆかいな仲間たち～

synopsis:
Everyone remember that classic story of "Journey to the West", where 3 travelers help a monk to right their misdeeds?

This is not that story...

"Chinyuuki: Tarou to Yukai na Nakama-tachi" is a parody of "Journey to the West", where an assassin by the name of Tarou Yamada is trying to right his misdeeds by travelling with a monk. Tarou's misdeeds were essentially assassinating tons of people and pooping on their graves. A monk saw him and cursed him into a baby-monkey-hybrid-thing. With the help of the Monk, Tarou has to battle demons and other weird anomalies to help regain his human form.

(Source: TV Tropes)

title: Netorare Saijiki: Ootsuka Kyouko no Baai

alternative_titles.ja: ネトラレ妻時記 ～大塚恭子の場合～

title: Black Sheep Down

alternative_titles.ja: ブラックシープ・ダウン

synopsis:
1-3. Black Sheep Down
4-6. White Sheep Down
7. Stray Sheep Down

title: Mezame no Mori
synopsis:
Editorial newcomer Yoshi knows that his fast-paced career is bound to be full of surprises, but he never planned on meeting one of his favorite authors at a book release party! When the talented writer Orito Suga shows up with his shy brother Masato, Yoshi is deeply touched by Masato's lonely smile...and his sweet, sparkling eyes. Stress and looming deadlines soon force Yoshi to move in with the temperamental Orito. Will the young editor get the full story behind these strangely inseparable brothers, or will he be kept in the dark for good?

(Source: Juné Manga)

alternative_titles.ja: Realize Me リアライズ・ミー

title: Komochi Host no Kiken na Rinjin

alternative_titles.en: The Host with a Little Boy and His Dangerous Neighbor
alternative_titles.ja: 子持ちホストの危険な隣人

synopsis:
Seiya is a nightclub host who is secretly raising his late sister's little boy Tenma as his own. Cute and angelic, Tenma is the only love and comfort in Seiya's life. Late one night, a drunk man suddenly kisses Seiya in the elevator of his upscale apartment building, and the dangerous man turns out to live next door...!! A parenting love story about a suspiciously handsome author and a host who isn't interested in love!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Do S Sensei ni Aisarete Tamaru ka

synonyms: I Won't Be Loved By My Sadist Teacher
alternative_titles.en: I Won't Be Loved By the Sadistic Teacher
alternative_titles.ja: ドS先生に愛されてたまるか

synopsis:
Azumi, the 28-year-old instructor who pesters his student 20-year-old Minami all the time, becomes in charge of the conference and the extra-curricular classes. One day, the assignment Minami worked hard at receives a cold evaluation, and he sheds tears in resentment. But Azumi saw it and suddenly kissed him!? 

(Source: Frontier Works, translated)

title: Zettai Zetsumei Kyoushitsu
synopsis:
Class 5 was going back to buses from their excursion at National Aerospace Laboratory, Atami Training Center. While they had lost their way out and were looking for exit an earthquake occured and now they are trapped under pile of rocks. No of them want to die, but what can they do in this situation?

(Source: MU)

title: Oyome-san Kouho ga Arawareta! Command wa?

alternative_titles.ja: お嫁さん候補があらわれた！ コマンドは？

synopsis:
One day, three girls suddenly appear in front of Sora on his way to school. They say that they are sisters and wife candidates of Sora.... Mikoto, Nanaka and Yuki. Sora is totally confused what to do.... However, they start living at his house. "What's going on...?" No one knows why....

(Source: ErogeShop)

title: Kishibe Rohan Tanpen Shousetsushuu

synonyms: Kishibe Rohan wa Ugokanai: Tanpen Shousetsushuu
alternative_titles.ja: 岸辺露伴 短編小説集

synopsis: Kishibe Rohan Tanpen Shousetsushuu is an anthology of short stories written by various authors and based on the Kishibe Rohan wa Ugokanai series.

title: Abunai Oka no Ie

alternative_titles.en: The House at the Dangerous Hill

synopsis:
A  “psychological sci-fi mystery,” which features an alien appearing in unexpected places in contemporary Japan. While Hagio is characteristically careful in her use of science, these tales, like most of Hagio’s are ultimately more about psychological issues, and individuals overcoming trauma, fear, and insecurity in the process of forming bonds with each other.

(source: matt-thorn)

title: Teishuku na Wakazuma to Taninbou: Fufu Koukan ni Nureru Nikubana

alternative_titles.ja: 貞淑な若妻と他人棒 ――夫婦交換に濡れる肉花――

title: Ai ni Kizuke yo

synonyms: Omoishi Hana no Sono Na wo Yobe
That Is the Name of the Flower You Cherish

synopsis:
1. Aoi Kajitsu (Green Fruit)
2. Ai ni Kizuke yo (Notice My Love)
3. Omoishi Hana no Sono Na wo Yobe (That Is the Name of the Flower You Cherish)
4. Sono Me de Inuke! (Pierce Me with Your Gaze!)
5. Heart Art Boys

title: Futago-chan Proof
synopsis:
A girl makes her twin brother to go to school for her. Boy-as-twin-sister gets dragged out after school by his big sister's friends. Big sister's friends find out that he's not his sister, and a little "punishment" ensues. Sexy punishment.

(Source: MU)

title: Holy Idol
synopsis:
Rembrary, the deputy of God loved by all and the holy high priest. While fighting against the Demon King who invaded his world, he woke up as an underrated idol in Korea! Will he be able to safely adjust to the idol life and return to his original world?

(Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Kamen Teacher Black
synopsis:
Kamen Teacher is back, and yet another school—Hiiragi Academy, the best metropolitan school for celebrities—needs to be "re-educated." But this time Akari isn't the man behind the mask. The secret identity of Kamen Teacher is... Let's find out more about the "legendary" Kamen Teacher Program.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Kamen Teacher vs Police (Crossover with Ino Head Gargoyle, 2 parts)

title: Sensou to Heiwa
synopsis: Manga based on War and Peace by Leo Tolstoy.

title: Ichi kara Hajimeru Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei

alternative_titles.ja: イチから始める最強勇者育成

title: Saint Kangoku Gakuen
synopsis:
At a strange and rigorous school, a girl who tries to defend a fallen friend is punished for her actions. 

(Source: FAKKU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 2: 15 no Natsu no Yakusoku, Shoujojikake no Yakata, Migawari no Adabana, Insa no Jubaku
Volume 5: Shoujo no Tamago
Volume 6: Tomaranai Zoushoku

title: Masuikai Hana
synopsis:
Of the major causes causing the collapse of modern medical care, the lack of anesthesiologists is most severe. At times serious and at times comical, this story of university hospital anesthesiologist Hanaoka Hanako realistically depicts her every day work and life. While she faces the struggles of hard work, low pay, and sexual harassment, Hanako is ready every day to administer anesthesia.

(Source: Jmanga)

title: Mikazuki to Orange
synopsis:
Endou Mizuki is a high school freshmen with no friends. But, one day she gets a reply on the message that she wrote on her desk. It's a strange way for two people to get a connection, but it happened! As a result, she meets a person who is completely her opposite, the orange-headed Youta. And just like that, Mizuki's small world begins to grow.

(Source: Elision Scans)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Tennen Kitty Honey

title: Smoker
synopsis:
Okabe, who works in the Mechanic Department and has a hard time remembering people's names and faces because of horrible past love experiences, is gay. One day, when the Sales Department's and General Affair's smoking area is under construction, they gather in the Mechanic Department's smoking area. On that day Okabe can feast his eyes on the men wearing suits, that he likes, but why does he suddenly remember the one night stand partner he met at a bar!? The anthology about the men who work at a company called Noah and all share the passion for smoking. Also includes the story Beautiful Maine Coon, where one cat brings together two different men! 

(Source: Bakeneko)

title: Marry Max!
synopsis: Following the last request of her former-idol mother, Marie began to search for her estranged brother. Her only clues are that he is a boy with the initial called M.K. and that he has the same cross-shaped birthmark as she does. In order to search for her brother, Marie entered show business, only to encounter all kinds of trouble!

title: Chijo
synopsis:
1. Training
This is a short colored one-shot. The older sister treats her younger brother like a dog.

2-4. A Sexual Molester
This short story starts out with a kid riding on the train to school. As usual, the train is packed and he is rubbing up against a woman in front of him. Painfully aware that he is getting hard, he rushes off the train only to be stopped by the woman who then forces him into a restroom and accuses him of groping. She then makes him pay for his actions by using him like a piece of meat. He eventually becomes her (and her boss') sex slave.

5. The Aunt
Tsuyoshi's aunt, Azuma, loves to come over to his house and touch him in inappropriate places. On the outside, he puts up a front that he doesn't like it but deep down he actually does. One day when his aunt comes over, he tells her to stay in the living room while he goes to his room to study. Realizing that he has a massive erection just from looking at his aunt, he tries to relieve himself but is caught by his aunt, of course.

6. I Don't Like Cigarettes
Rokujo finds a pack of cigarettes on the ground and notices that they're the same kind that his mother likes. As he puts one of them in his mouth to taste, he is caught by his PE Instructor, Kurokawa-sensei. Afraid that she'll tell his parents that he smokes, he offers to accept any punishment. Kurokawa-sensei obviously takes advantage of this... (This one-shot has a sequel in Ero Ane)

7. Lascivious Liar
Kazuyoshi's sister is staying home today because she is feeling ill. Wanting to be a good brother, he brings her breakfast before heading off to school. As he starts to leave, his sister asks him to check her temperature by touching foreheads. As he leans in, his sister tazes him. When Kazuyoshi regains consciousness, he realizes that he is tied up. I am sure you can imagine what happens from there...

(Source: BakaBT)
